      • authenticateTwiceWithRenew

        public void authenticateTwiceWithRenew()
                                throws TicketException,
                                       AuthenticationException
        This test simulates : - a first authentication for a default service - a second authentication with the renew parameter and the same service (and same credentials) - a validation of the second ticket. When supplemental authentications were returned with the chained authentications, the validation specification failed as it only expects one authentication. Thus supplemental authentications should not be returned in the chained authentications. Both concepts are orthogonal.
        Throws:
        TicketException
        AuthenticationException

      • testDestroyRemoteRegistry

        public void testDestroyRemoteRegistry()
                               throws TicketException,
                                      AuthenticationException
        This test checks that the TGT destruction happens properly for a remote registry. It previously failed when the deletion happens before the ticket was marked expired because an update was necessary for that.
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException
        TicketException
